title: Pre-Requisites for SEM-2
content: Hey seniors! I'm making the switch from the physics cycle to chem for the second semester. Any advice on specific prerequisites or things I should keep in mind? Also, which concepts should I go through for each subject before classes start so I'm not completely lost from the beginning, especially in math? Please drop any resources like notes, Google Drive/YouTube links that you found useful. Thanks a bunch! ðŸŽ“ðŸ“š

comments.body: 2nd sem is possibly the easiest sem of all as by now most probably u would have got an idea on how to study for ur exams and the level is also the same as 1st sem so try to score as much sgpa as possible as majority of people tank their cgpas in 3rd sem.
